key.name: position-in-panel
key.description: Panel to show the indicator in

key.name: position-index
key.description: Number of other elements in the panel before the indicator

key.name: hide-activities-button
key.description: Hide GNOME default workspace indicator (formerly "Activities" button)

key.name: scroll-wraparound
key.description: Scrolling past the last workspace will wrap around to the first one (and viceversa)

key.name: scroll-inverse
key.description: Invert the direction of scrolling

key.name: middle-click-close-app
key.description: Clicking with the middle mouse button on an app icon will close the app

key.name: click-on-active-overview
key.summary: Click on current workspace triggers overview
key.description: Clicking the active workspace triggers overview

key.name: click-on-focus-minimize
key.summary: Click on focused application to minimize
key.description: Clicking on the current focused application will minimize it

key.name: indicator-show-active-workspace
key.description: Show an indicator below the current active workspace

key.name: indicator-show-focused-app
key.description: Show an indicator above the current focused app

key.name: indicator-color
key.description: Color of active workspace and focused app indicators

key.name: indicator-round-borders
key.description: Round borders of active workspace and focused app indicators

key.name: indicator-show-indexes
key.description: Show the workspace names before the workspace icons

key.name: indicator-hide-empty
key.description: Hides the name of empty workspaces

key.name: indicator-all-text
key.summary: Apps on all workspaces indicator text
key.description: Text indicator to show when there are apps on all workspaces

key.name: indicator-use-custom-names
key.description: Display custom (editable by rigth click on workspace) names instead of indexes

key.name: apps-all-desaturate
key.description: Show only black and white apps icons

key.name: apps-inactive-effect
key.description: Effect to apply to inactive (not focused) apps icons

key.name: apps-minimized-effect
key.description: Effect to apply to minimized apps icons

key.name: icons-limit
key.description: Maximum number of icons displayed in a single inactive workspace indicator. Active workspace is always unlimited. 0 = unlimited

key.name: icons-group
key.description: Show only one icon for each application in the workspace indicator

key.name: icons-ignored
key.description: List of applications ignored (no icons will be shown for them)

key.name: log-apps-id
key.description: Console log the ids of the applications currently running, to find the ids of the applications to ignore. Open log with "journalctl /usr/bin/gnome-shell -f -o cat"
